words.source: Noun construct with 1st person singular suffix; KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'my father'
Hiphil perfect 3rd masculine singular + 1st person singular object suffix; KJV 'adjured me', ESV 'made me swear'
Preposition + infinitive construct; introduces direct speech; all major translations render 'saying'
Interjection; KJV 'Lo', ESV 'Behold', NASB 'Behold'; marks emphasis in speech
1st person singular independent pronoun; emphatic form; all translations render 'I'
Qal participle masculine singular; KJV 'die', ESV 'am about to die', NASB 'am about to die'
Preposition + noun + 1st person singular suffix; KJV 'in my grave', ESV 'in my grave'
Relative pronoun; introduces relative clause; all translations 'which'
Qal perfect 1st person singular; KJV 'digged', ESV 'dug', NASB 'dug'; some sources note ambiguity with root meaning 'buy'
Preposition + 1st person singular suffix; KJV 'for me', ESV 'for myself'
Preposition + noun; KJV 'in the land', ESV 'in the land'
Proper noun; all translations 'Canaan'
Adverb with directional suffix; KJV 'there', ESV 'there'
Qal imperfect 2nd masculine singular + 1st person singular object suffix; KJV 'shalt thou bury me', ESV 'shall you bury me'
Conjunction + adverb; KJV 'Now therefore', ESV 'Now therefore'
Qal imperfect 1st person singular; KJV 'let me go up', ESV 'let me go up'; means 'go to Canaan'
Particle of entreaty; KJV 'I pray thee', ESV 'please', NASB 'please'
Conjunction + Qal imperfect 1st person singular; KJV 'and bury', ESV 'and bury'
Direct object marker; no English equivalent; marks 'my father' as direct object
Noun + 1st person singular suffix; KJV 'my father', ESV 'my father'
Conjunction + Qal perfect 1st person singular (converted by waw); KJV 'and I will come again', ESV 'and I will return'
